title: OSIC Pulmonary Fibrosis Progression: Basic EDA!
description: OSIC Pulmonary Fibrosis Progression - EDA 1. Introduction 🃏 1.1 What is Pulmonary fibrosis? Pulmonary fibrosis is a lung disease that occurs when lung tissue becomes damaged and scarred.  This thickened, stiff tissue makes it more difficult for your lungs to work properly. If you want to know further about this type lung disease, I have linked below an informative video.
